net.oneplus.shelf.card

Class CardManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.oneplus.shelf.card.CardManager

  • public final class CardManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for card managements such as posting a card or removing a card.

      • ACTION_CARD_UPDATE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_CARD_UPDATE
        Sent when it is time to update a card in your channel.

        This may be sent in response to new Shelf board instance of this channel has been instantiated, existing Shelf board needs to be refreshed such as refresh button is clicked or the Shelf board is visible again to user.

        The intent will contain the following extras:

        EXTRA_CHANNEL_TOKENThe channel token the card to update
        EXTRA_CARD_TAGThe card tag of the card to update
        EXTRA_AT_SHELFThe state shows current page is Shelf

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_CARD_DELETED

      • post

        public PostCardResult post(@NonNull
                           java.lang.String apiKey,
                           java.lang.String channelToken,
                           int tag,
                           @NonNull
                           Card card)
        Post a card to be shown Shelf.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key assigned to current channel. Must not be null
        channelToken - The token assigned to this channel
        tag - An identifier for this card. The identical (provider, tag) is specified, the new card object replaces old one
        card - A Card object describing what to show the user. Must not be null
        Returns:
        A Result object containing result of posting card.

      • post

        public PostCardResult post(java.lang.String channelToken,
                           @NonNull
                           Card card)
        Post a card to be shown Shelf.
        Parameters:
        channelToken - The token assigned to this channel
        card - A Card object describing what to show the user. Must not be null
        Returns:
        A Result object containing result of posting card.

      • delete

        public DeleteCardResult delete(@NonNull
                               java.lang.String apiKey,
                               java.lang.String channelToken,
                               int tag)
        Delete a card from Shelf.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key assigned to current channel. Must not be null
        channelToken - The token assigned to this channel
        tag - An identifier for this card
        Returns:
        A Result object containing result of deleting card and number of cards deleted.

      • clear

        public DeleteCardResult clear(@NonNull
                              java.lang.String apiKey,
                              java.lang.String channelToken)
        Clear all cards from Shelf by api key and channel token.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key assigned to current channel. Must not be null
        channelToken - The token assigned to this channel
        Returns:
        A Result object containing result of deleting card and number of cards deleted.

      • get

        public GetCardResult get(@NonNull
                         java.lang.String apiKey,
                         java.lang.String channelToken,
                         int cardTag)
        Get card(s) from Shelf by api key and channel token.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key assigned to current channel. Must not be null
        channelToken - The token assigned to this channel
        cardTag - The specific tag of the designated card
        Returns:
        A Result object containing result of card

      • get

        public GetCardResult get(@NonNull
                         java.lang.String apiKey,
                         java.lang.String channelToken)
        Get cards from Shelf by api key and channel token. The page defaults to 1 and the number of cards to return defaults to 100.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key assigned to current channel. Must not be null
        channelToken - The token assigned to this channel
        Returns:
        A Result object containing result of card and number of cards returned.

      • get

        public GetCardResult get(@NonNull
                         java.lang.String apiKey,
                         java.lang.String channelToken,
                         int page,
                         int perPage)
        Get card(s) from Shelf by api key and channel token.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key assigned to current channel. Must not be null
        channelToken - The token assigned to this channel
        page - The page of results to return. The page defaults to 1.
        perPage - The number of cards to return. The accepted values: 10 - 300 and defaults to 100.
        Returns:
        A Result object containing result of card and number of cards returned.

      • isCardPosted

        public IsCardPostedResult isCardPosted(@NonNull
                                       java.lang.String apiKey,
                                       @NonNull
                                       java.lang.String channelToken,
                                       int cardTag)
        Check if the specific card has beed posted.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key assigned to current channel. Must not be null
        channelToken - The token assigned to this channel
        cardTag - The tag of the card to be checked.
        Returns:
        A Result object containing result of card and number of cards returned.
